directions.text: Divide meat into four patties and season with salt and pepper.
Sous-vide in bags at 125Â° for 30 mins to 3 hours.
Pat patties dry and season with salt and pepper again.
Sear each side with vegetable oil in a pan for 45 secs on each side.
Be sure to add cheese on top after the first flip.
Serve with bun and any desired condiments.
